manifest_desc.message: Open links from pinned tabs into new tabs.

opts_title_enabled.message: Enabled: Clicked links will open in new tabs.

opts_title_exclude.message: Outbound Links Only: Keep links to the same domain in the pinned tab.

localdata_note.message: This extension uses the localStorage function defined in HTML5. Following table shows the all data which is stored in the localStorage database. The 'Remove All' button below will remove all currently stored data. You may need to reload pinned tabs after resetting this data to ensure the proper settings are applied.

opts_note.message: When you pin a new tab, the default settings below will apply to that tab. You can change these later from the context menu.
